docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court lifted a travel ban on Pakistan’s former ambassador to the United States on Monday, a sign that the so-called memogate scandal may be losing steam.
docs.abstract: Pakistan's Supreme Court lifts travel ban on Husain Haqqani, former United States ambassador; Haqqani had resigned amid allegations he had sent a memo to Washington asking for help in curbing the Pakistani military in exchange for security policies favorable to the US.

docs.snippet: A ban on travel from West Africa might seem like a simple and smart response to the frightening Ebola outbreak there. It's become a central demand of Republicans on Capitol Hill and some Democrats, and is popular with the public. But health expert...
docs.lead_paragraph: A ban on travel from West Africa might seem like a simple and smart response to the frightening Ebola outbreak there. It's become a central demand of Republicans on Capitol Hill and some Democrats, and is popular with the public. But health experts are nearly unanimous in saying it's a bad idea that could backfire.

headline.main: Effectiveness of Ebola Travel Ban Questioned
headline.print_headline: Effectiveness of Ebola Travel Ban Questioned

docs.snippet: LONDON, Nov. 30 -- Two Members of Parliament, Hamilton W. Kerr and Ronald L. Tree, who want to visit Paris, received considerable sympathy from fellow-members in the House of Commons today, but they failed to move Herbert Morrison, Home Secretary,...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 30 -- Two Members of Parliament, Hamilton W. Kerr and Ronald L. Tree, who want to visit Paris, received considerable sympathy from fellow-members in the House of Commons today, but they failed to move Herbert Morrison, Home Secretary, from his decision that their journey was not really necessary.
docs.abstract: Brit Sec Morrison bars Paris trip by 2 MPs because of travel problems
